queryDefinitions.name: 판매전환 중복건검증
queryDefinitions.query: SELECT sale_id, COUNT(*) FROM sales GROUP BY sale_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;

queryDefinitions.name: 원영수증 누락건
queryDefinitions.query: SELECT * FROM receipts WHERE original_receipt_id IS NULL;

queryDefinitions.name: 판매전환의 예약취소건
queryDefinitions.query: SELECT * FROM sales WHERE status = 'CANCELLED' AND type = 'RESERVATION';

queryResults.error: ORA-00942: table or view does not exist
